# ElectricityInsightQuery.Options

**Structure**

A set of options that specify optional information to include in electricity insight records returned from the insight service.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Options
```

## Overview

Using an empty [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/ElectricityInsightQuery/Options-swift.struct] returns the total value  of [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/ElectricityInsightRecord] without cleanliness or tariff breakdown.

## Creating an option set

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an option set with the given raw value.
- **rawValue**: The raw value of the option set.

## Getting the optional query insights

- **cleanliness**: A query that includes cleanliness insights.
- **tariff**: A query that includes tariff-based insights.

## Adding optional insight records

- **options**: The optional information to include in returned electricity insight records.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- Hashable
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
